{"id":341302565,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1589821224,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/341302565/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> idx; \n        int last_repeated_char_idx = -1; \n        int max_len = 0; \n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); ++i) {\n            unordered_map<char, int>::iterator it = idx.find(s[i]); \n            if (it == idx.end()) {\n                if (i - last_repeated_char_idx + 1 > max_len) {\n                    max_len = i - last_repeated_char_idx; \n                }\n                idx[s[i]] = i; \n            } else {\n                if (it -> second > last_repeated_char_idx) {\n                    last_repeated_char_idx = it -> second; \n                }\n                if (i - last_repeated_char_idx + 1 > max_len) {\n                    max_len = i - last_repeated_char_idx; \n                }\n                idx[s[i]] = i; \n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max_len; \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
